name: Headlight (itch)
description:
DEVELOPED BY: HEADLIGHT TEAM

Headlight is a 2D platformer game where darkness surrounds you and only your light illuminates the way. That light exists because you are happy, but you are also alone, and that depresses you, reducing your smile and your light. Only finding other people will make you happy, because happiness is something you share with others.

Headlight is the winner of Barcelona Games World Game Jam 2017, awarded with the Best Videogame price.
